dt: {bc}of, relating to, or located near a surface
{bc}lying on, not penetrating below, or affecting only the surface
{bc}concerned only with the obvious or apparent {bc}{sx|shallow||}

pt: {sc}superficial{/sc} {sc}shallow{/sc} {sc}cursory{/sc} mean lacking in depth or solidity. {sc}superficial{/sc} implies a concern only with surface aspects or obvious features.
{sc}shallow{/sc} is more generally derogatory in implying lack of depth in knowledge, reasoning, emotions, or character.
{sc}cursory{/sc} suggests a lack of thoroughness or a neglect of details.

pt.t: gave the letter only a {it}cursory{/it} reading

quotes.t: Angelina Jolie goes blond and bubbly and hell hasn't even started freezing over. The brooding brunette donned a Monroe-esque platinum coif for her most recent film, "Life or Something Like It." She plays a {qword}superficial{/qword} reporter who learns what's most important in life—which is, apparently, getting it on with Edward Burns.

Wonderbra model Eva Herzigova sued a Canadian underwear company that refused to pay her $30,000 fee because she showed up for the photo shoot with a short haircut that company didn't like. You know, it's shameful in this day and age how {qword}superficial{/qword} and sexist some of these ad execs are.
All this discussion of money may seem a vulgar recital of greed. But that is really just a {qword}superficial{/qword}, simplistic criticism and usually a dishonest one.

et: Middle English, from Late Latin {it}superficialis{/it}, from Latin {it}superficies{/it} {dx_ety}see {dxt|superficies||}{/dx_ety}
shortdef: of, relating to, or located near a surface
lying on, not penetrating below, or affecting only the surface

dt: {bc}the thin layer of loose fatty connective tissue underlying the dermisand binding it to the parts beneath

shortdef: the thin layer of loose fatty connective tissue underlying the dermisand binding it to the parts beneath —called also hypodermis

dt: {bc}either of two arterial branches that supply a large muscle on each side of the head involved in raising the lower jaw and that arise from the {d_link|cerebral artery|cerebral artery} supplying the deep structures of the face

{bc}either of the two terminal branches of each external {d_link|carotid artery|carotid artery} that pass upward over the {d_link|zygomatic process|zygomatic process} of the {d_link|temporal bone|temporal bone}, and are distributed by way of branches especially to the more superficial parts of the forehead and sides of the head and face

{bc}a branch of the superficial temporal artery that arises just above the {d_link|zygomatic arch|zygomatic arch}, sends branches to one of the large muscles involved in raising the lower jaw, and {d_link|anastomoses|anastomose} with a deep temporal artery
{bc}any of the three branches of the artery supplying the lateral surfaces of the {d_link|cerebral cortex|cerebral cortex}

shortdef: either of two arterial branches that supply a large muscle on each side of the head involved in raising the lower jaw and that arise from the cerebral artery supplying the deep structures of the face

either of the two terminal branches of each external carotid artery that pass upward over the zygomatic process of the temporal bone, and are distributed by way of branches especially to the more superficial parts of the forehead and sides of the head and face

a branch of the superficial temporal artery that arises just above the zygomatic arch, sends branches to one of the large muscles involved in raising the lower jaw, and anastomoses with a deep temporal artery
